page.title: 10RECREATION - CLUBS
page.content:
Clubs flourish, giving a wide age range a wide choice of activities, as can be seen from the list below
Over-Sixties: meets once a fortnight; about 20 members; play dominoes,whist etc.; outings to Stately Homes etc.
Thursday Club: meets every week; a group for women, about 30 attend: sewing, crafts, occasional talk by guest speaker.
Horticultural Society: meets 4 times a year; holds annual show; 4 annual visits to special gardens; 65 members.
Bell Ringers: meet once a week; play on Sundays, at weddings and at other churches.
W.I.: meets once a month.
